description: After a late-night exchange with a trusted confidant, Rada quietly instructs her team to forgo the broadcast launch in favor of publishing guides on local organizing and resource sharing.
Reports surface of residents creating neighborhood assemblies and bypassing BCI checkpoints as the heatwave triggers widespread system outages.
Grassroots collectives, fueled by shared know-how and support, become the main channel for aid as BCI-regulated services collapse citywide.
